channel.title: Accounts That are banned for Botting
channel.description: do accounts that get banned for botting ever get unbanned on RuneScape? I have heard that after a year or something they get unbanned, i am wondering if they do or not?

item.title: Accounts That are banned for Botting
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Torpedo, post:5, topic:332550”]Accounts that are banned for botting on Runescape are permanently banned. Even if the offense is expired, the account will remain banned.

A macro program that will control your character for you while you are away from your computer. Our systems detect these and we permanently ban any accounts we find using them.

Check out RuneScape’s Scamming Prevention Guide.

Can be located in:

Home > Customer Support > Safety & Security Guidelines > Scamming Prevention Guide[/quote]
but as i said, i was banner for macroing and i was unbanned after the ban expired

Read full topic
item.source: Accounts That are banned for Botting

item.title: Accounts That are banned for Botting
item.dc:creator: @Torpedo Torpedo
item.description:
@Torpedo wrote:

Accounts that are banned for botting on Runescape are permanently banned. Even if the offense is expired, the account will remain banned.

A macro program that will control your character for you while you are away from your computer. Our systems detect these and we permanently ban any accounts we find using them.

Check out RuneScape’s Scamming Prevention Guide.

Can be located in:

Home > Customer Support > Safety & Security Guidelines > Scamming Prevention Guide

Read full topic
item.source: Accounts That are banned for Botting

item.title: Accounts That are banned for Botting
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

mine was banned for botting (and various other offences) in 2007 and it was unbanned like 6 months ago when they did that new update on expiring bans.

Read full topic
item.source: Accounts That are banned for Botting

item.title: Accounts That are banned for Botting
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“kyled123, post:1, topic:332550”]do accounts that get banned for botting ever get unbanned on RuneScape? I have heard that after a year or something they get unbanned, i am wondering if they do or not?[/quote]no. i’ve had my account banned since '06, appealed it in january and it took them til 3 days ago to deny it

(are you asking if they’re automatically unbanned, or if you can appeal the ban and they’ll accept it over time?)

Read full topic
item.source: Accounts That are banned for Botting

item.title: Accounts That are banned for Botting

@B2300_T4nk wrote:
